posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.52 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Now you can zoom in on a view-once image or video. What once was a bug has been fixed once and for all.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.51 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.38 release

posts.cooked: Updated installed without issues, no crashes while it started.

New Version: 7.52.0.686-beta

33 new commits since 7.51.0.680-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.52 [1]

  • Enable AccountEntropyPool [2]

  • Update the README for 2025 [3]

  • Always auto-set device name in linking [4]

  • Consolidate TSRequest auth into a single type [5]

  • Clean up SDSAnyWriteTransaction finalization blocks [6]

  • Clean up SDSAnyWriteTransaction async completion [7]

  • Remove GRDBTransaction extensions for accessing Database [8]

  • One transaction type to rule them all and in the darkness bind them [9]

  • convert some donation logic from promises to swift concurrency [10]

  • fix missing implementation on SDSDatabaseStorage [11]

  • fix warnings [12]

  • CancellableContinuation internal improvements […] [13]

  • Remove Promise-based database methods [14]

  • Update bank-processing time strings [15]

  • Create threads when sending profile key for call [16]

  • Remove @escaping for non-escaping block [17]

  • Remove throws that doesn’t throw [18]

  • Asyncify pre keys’ waitForMessageProcessing(…) [19]

  • Support zooming in view-once media [20]

  • Clean up unused redeemReceipt code [21]

  • Fix issue with missing media key before backup download [22]

  • Calling: Add cache for relay server requests [23]

  • Adjust trailing disclosure chevron depending on name language [24]

  • Avoid enqueuing auto-downloads for messages the user manually canceled [25]

  • Fix a missing return during new account profile setup [26]

  • Set the uploadTimestamp on outgoing attachment pointer protos [27]

  • Remove unused capabilities [28]

  • Keep some SVR state around when updating to a new master key [29]

  • Revert "Remove redundant avatar download invocations" [30]

  • Add comment about the local avatar [31]

  • Update release notes [32]

  • Update translations [33]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.51.0.680-beta…7.52.0.686-beta

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

At least 59 languages changed since 7.51.0.680-beta:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.51.0.680-beta so far here.

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.
I’d think you’re better off with a new thread in the support category.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.53 release.
